flavor: I've identified a way to negate their strengths.

metadata.flavor: I've identified a way to negate their strengths.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You gain 6 surges. Until the end of the encounter or until you are dying, whenever the Director spends Malice (see *[Draw Steel: Monsters](https://mcdm.gg/DS-Monsters)*), choose yourself or one ally within 10 squares. The chosen character gains 2 of their Heroic Resource.
